participant_1.background:
I want to learn how to manage my diabetes better so that I can continue to enjoy my work and my life.
I like driving my red Impala.
my favorite team is the raptors.
i want people to think i am cool.
I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well.

I am proud of being able to make my passion for music a reality, even though I have a day job.
I'm a software engineer, but my passion is writing.
i have a cat named seven of nine.
my brother thinks he s a viking.

content.text: Hey there! Hope you are having a great day!
Doing well, thank you! I hope you are too!
I am doing well! Thank you!  I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well.  What are you passionate about?
I am passionate about making my passion for music a reality, even though I have a day job.  I am a software engineer, but my passion is writing.  I love to write music in my spare time.
That's awesome!  I used to be a professional dancer, so I love music too!  I also like to drive my red Impala, and I love watching basketball.  I am a big fan of the Raptors!
That's awesome!  I like to spend rainy days in my studio, practicing my dance moves.  I also have a cat named Seven of Nine.  She's a great companion.

That's a cool name for a cat!  I love cats, but I don't have any pets right now.  I am looking forward to the weekend.  I am going to visit my brother, who thinks he's a viking!  He's a lot of fun to be around.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I hope you have a great time!
